com.bmwcarit.barefoot.spatial

Class Geography

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.spatial.Geography
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpatialOperator

    public class Geography
extends Object
implements SpatialOperator
    SpatialOperator as collection of spatial operations in WGS-84 projection (SRID 4326).

      • intercept

        public double intercept(com.esri.core.geometry.Point a,
                        com.esri.core.geometry.Point b,
                        com.esri.core.geometry.Point c)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialOperator
        Gets interception point of a straight line, defined by Points a and b, intercepted by Point c. The interception point is described as the linearly interpolated fraction f in the interval [0,1] of the line from a to b. A fraction of f=0 is the same as Point at a and f=1 is the same as Point b.

        Note: The coordinates of the interception point can be determined by interpolation of the fraction along the straight line, e.g. with SpatialOperator.interpolate(Point, Point, double).

        Specified by:
        intercept in interface SpatialOperator
        Parameters:
        a - Start point of straight line a to b.
        b - End point of straight line a to b.
        c - Point that intercepts straight line a to b.
        Returns:
        Interception point described as the linearly interpolated fraction f in the interval [0,1] of the line from a to b.

      • interpolate

        public com.esri.core.geometry.Point interpolate(com.esri.core.geometry.Point a,
                                                com.esri.core.geometry.Point b,
                                                double f)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialOperator
        Gets Point from linear interpolation of a fraction f, in the interval [0,1], on a straight line, defined by two points a and b. A fraction of f=0 is the same as Point at a and f=1 is the same as Point b.
        Specified by:
        interpolate in interface SpatialOperator
        Parameters:
        a - Start point of straight line a to b.
        b - End point of straight line from a to b.
        f - Fraction f, in the interval [0,1], to be linearly interpolated on straight line from a to b.
        Returns:
        Point linearly interpolated from fraction f on a straight line of points a and b.

        Parameters:

      • intercept

        public double intercept(com.esri.core.geometry.Polyline p,
                        com.esri.core.geometry.Point c)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialOperator
        Gets interception point of a Polyline intercepted by Point c. This is analog to SpatialOperator.intercept(Point, Point, Point). The fraction f refers to the full length of the Polyline.
        Specified by:
        intercept in interface SpatialOperator
        Parameters:
        p - Polyline to be intercepted.
        c - Point that intercepts straight line a to b.
        Returns:
        Interception point described as the linearly interpolated fraction f in the interval [0,1] of the Polyline.

      • interpolate

        public com.esri.core.geometry.Point interpolate(com.esri.core.geometry.Polyline path,
                                                double f)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialOperator
        Gets Point from linear interpolation of a fraction f, in the interval [0,1], on a Polyline. This is analog to SpatialOperator.interpolate(Point, Point, double).The fraction refers to the full length of the Polyline.
        Specified by:
        interpolate in interface SpatialOperator
        Parameters:
        path - Polyline of interpolation.
        f - Fraction f, in the interval [0,1], to be linearly interpolated on Polyline.
        Returns:
        Point linearly interpolated from fraction f on a Polyline.

      • interpolate

        public com.esri.core.geometry.Point interpolate(com.esri.core.geometry.Polyline p,
                                                double l,
                                                double f)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialOperator
        Gets Point from linear interpolation of a fraction f, in the interval [0,1], on a Polyline. This is an extension of SpatialOperator.interpolate(Polyline, double) and takes the length of the Polyline as parameter reduce computational effort.
        Specified by:
        interpolate in interface SpatialOperator
        Parameters:
        p - Polyline of interpolation.
        l - Length of the Polyline in meters.
        f - Fraction f, in the interval [0,1], to be linearly interpolated on Polyline.
        Returns:
        Point linearly interpolated from fraction f on a Polyline.

        Description copied from interface: SpatialOperator
        Gets Envelope2D that encloses of a circular area defined by a center Point c and radius r given in meters.
        Specified by:
        envelope in interface SpatialOperator
        Parameters:
        c - Center Point of the circle.
        radius - Radius of the circle in meters.
        Returns:
        Enclosing Envelope2D of the circular area defined by center Point c and radius r.
